title: Bitcoin dips below $42k, liquidates majority of long positions across exchanges
description:
Bitcoin (BTC) fell below $42,000 for the second time over the weekend after failing to break above $43,100 amid subdued trading volumes after the ETF hype at the end of last week. As of press time, BTC was trading at $41,870 on most of the large exchanges. The price is still above the key support […]

The post Bitcoin dips below $42k, liquidates majority of long positions across exchanges appeared first on CryptoSlate.
